item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m excited to present you some of my project. Don’t hesitate to reach me out for a feedback, advices or any other kind of information! Estelle

item.title: Master 1 Thesis, European Option Pricing
item.description: My master 1 endend with a thesis. Along with my team mate In√©s, we choosed to dig into European Option Pricing. The problem was challenging since both of us didn’t have any kind of background in finance. In a nut shell, an european option is a contract which gives the buyer (the owner or holder of the option) the right, but not the obligation, to buy or sell an underlying asset or instrument at a specified strike price on a specified date.
